title: LeaderHeads如何制作一个等级排行榜
author: 卫斯李
txt_content:
如题
类似于 金币排行榜一样

&9&l① &b<balance_name_1>&e &m   &3&l <balance_score_1>&e&l
我将balance 改为 xp 就直接没了

replies.author: 苏子峰
replies.txt_content:
- '&dLv.1 &u<va-level_name_1> &7>> &C&O<va-level_score_1>'
  - ''
  - '&3Lv.2 &a<va-level_name_2> &7>> &C&O<va-level_score_2>'
  - ''
  - '&9Lv.3 &a<va-level_name_3> &7>> &C&O<va-level_score_3>'
  - ''
  - '&7Lv.4 &a<va-level_name_4> &7>> &C&O<va-level_score_4>'
  - '&7Lv.5 &a<va-level_name_5> &7>> &C&O<va-level_score_5>'
  - '&7Lv.6 &a<va-level_name_6> &7>> &C&O<va-level_score_6>'
  - '&7Lv.7 &a<va-level_name_7> &7>> &C&O<va-level_score_7>'
  - '&7Lv.8 &a<va-level_name_8> &7>> &C&O<va-level_score_8>'

你好这是我服务器hd配置
